name: PurrCatory
description:
The Demo Build Of This Game Was Made In Just Over A Week. There May Be Some Problems. We Will Try To Fix These Problems In The Final Build (If I Can Muster The Effort To Finish This Game)

Things Still To Add

  • We Need To Design More Of The OST To Add
  • We Need To Create Some Sound Effects
  • We Need To Create The Rest Of The Sprites
  • We MAY Need To Do Some More Coding

Story

You Play As A Cat Named Mittens Who Gets Sent To Hell For No Reason By The Evil Cat Satan. Your Mission Is To Kill Him And Return To Your One True Love Known As Kitty

Development Team

Development, Art, OST: Pikakid98
Coding: Nhaselton
Additional OST, Additional Coding: SonicboomColt
Additional Artwork: Psychicpie
Additional Artwork: EyeShellGames

Known Bugs

  • Mittens Will Sometimes Get Completely Stuck In The Walls. But Mittens Sometimes Grabs Onto Edges. If You Get Stuck And Can't Move Simply Press R To Restart The Level
  • The Movement Changes For Mittens Will Bug Out And Mittens Will Start Moving Faster And Backwards If The Directional Keys Are Continually Pressed

Plans For The Game

Um.. Hopefully To Not Just Leave It.. But It Will Be Free On Gamejolt Because I Have A Much Better Game To Be Selling

Controls

  • Press Space To Jump
  • Press R To Restart A Level
  • Press Q To Go To The Level Select
  • Left Click On The Levels, New And load Button (Loading Has Currently Been Disabled In The Demo Version)
